verbs.description: Tuesday , MS-13 gang member Joel Martinez [V: was] sentenced to 40 years in prison for the murder of a 15 year - old boy from a rival gang . The Boston Globe reported on May 14 that Martinez " was captured on video bragging about the slaying . " The Globe also noted that the killer 's nickname is the singular version of the word President Donald Trump used two days later to describe MS-13
